# A repeatability approach to assortment


### Run `rptr` model

```{r}
# run repeat-r model
model_flock <- rptGaussian(behav ~ tide_stage + (1|flock) + (1|id), 
                           grname = c("flock", "Fixed"),
                           data = flock_data)
```
